title: The Formidable Son-In-Law: The Charismatic Lucas Gray - Novel Updates
author: Mu Jiuzhou
description: Six years ago, he disappeared silently! After six years, he becomes the unparalleled 'God of War' and returns with glory, only to find that he has a daughter whom he never knew of. Looking at his wife and his daughter, he says, 'In this lifetime, I'll bring you the greatest honor and glory!â€>
